content:
I'd be happy to help you organize your art-related activities into a calendar or timeline.

From what you've shared so far, it sounds like you have two events to add to your timeline:

1. A guided tour at the City Museum (which occurred a week before the photography exhibition)
2. The photography exhibition (exact date unknown, but we know it happened a week after the museum tour)

To help me create a more accurate timeline, could you please provide me with the following information:

* The exact dates of both events (or at least the month and year)
* Any other art-related activities you've participated in recently (e.g., art classes, workshops, exhibitions, etc.)

Once I have this information, I can help you create a timeline or calendar to keep track of your art-related activities.
